command.source: SELECT BILLING_END_MONTH, PB_ID, PB_PBA_ID, DELIVERY_SYSTEM_CD, BRD_COPAY_AT, BRD_COPAY_RT, BRDNGENC_COPAY_AT, BRDNGENC_COPAY_RT, GENC_COPAY_AT, GENC_COPAY_RT, FRMBRD_COPAY_AT, FRMBRD_COPAY_RT, NONFRM_COPAY_AT, NONFRM_COPAY_RT, RATE_AMT_RSOL_CD, PVT_COPAY_IN, MAINT_COPAY_IN, OTHER_COPAY_IN, CALC_STY_CD, PVT_PRN_NTW_IN, PHM_NTW_IN, MIN_MAX_COPAY_CD, CALC_DAW_CD, CALC_DAW_ACT_CD, CLL_PNT_LMT_IN, MAX_DAY_SUPPLY_QY, MAX_ALW_BEN_CD, MAX_OOP_CD, DEDUCTIBLE_CD, FORMULARY_ID, FORMULARY_ICT_CD, GENERIC_ICT_CD, PROCESSED_DT FROM SUMMARY.TCOPAY_PLAN_SUMM

catch.command:
[ERROR] REFESH TQL_TCOPAY_PLAN_SUMM

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
Log File: ${system.getProperty('logfile')}


#if (${script.getLastStatement()})

Last Statement

${script.getLastStatement()}

#end

Stack Trace

${stackTrace}
